headline: Is PG's Supply Chain Revamp a Game-Changer in Consumer Staples?
summary: Procter & Gamble's digital supply chain overhaul and AI-powered automation aim to blunt tariff shocks and boost resilience.

raw.headline: Is PG's Supply Chain Revamp a Game-Changer in Consumer Staples?

headline: The Most Refreshing Drop of the Summer: Olay and Secret Debut Limited Edition Summer Fizz Scent Collection
summary: CINCINNATI, June 12, 2025--Olay and Secret, powerhouse brands from Procter & Gamble, are shaking up the season with the launch of the limited-edition Summer Fizz Scent collection featuring serum-infused body washes from Olay and clinical strength antiperspirants from Secret. Designed to deliver an invigorating burst of freshness, this collection features fruity scents and superior skin-delivery technology that nourishes skin and provides a sweet escape to make every day feel like a sun-soaked ge
